name: Catch The Gifts.
description:
Get ready for a SUPER fun and INSANELY addicting CHRISTMAS game. You need to control the right and left arms separately and try to catch the gifts. It's not as easy as you think!

Help Santa catch the presents. You need to time it just right or you will drop the gifts. How high can you score?

FEATURES
- Easy to play but hard to master
- Fun cartoon style graphics
- Fun and addicting Christmas game
